DOC.criteria: Women childbearing potential Menopausal woman Have body mass index 18.0 29.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) Women lactate Have previously complete withdrawn study study investigate baricitinib Currently enrol , complete discontinue within last 90 day clinical trial involve investigational product Have pulse rate le 50 beat per minute ( bpm ) screen Have current recent history ( le 30 day prior screen and/or less 45 day prior Day 1 ) clinically significant bacterial , fungal , parasitic , viral ( include rhinopharyngitis ) , mycobacterial infection Have absolute neutrophil count less 2000 cells/microliter ( 2 Ã— 10^9/liter ) screen Day 1 Show evidence human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection and/or positive human HIV antibody Have expose live vaccine within 12 week prior first dose expect need/receive live vaccine Intend use overthecounter prescription medication and/or herbal supplement within 14 day prior dose study Have use intend use drug substance know substrate , inducer , inhibitor Pglycoprotein ( Pgp ) within 30 day prior dose throughout study Have symptomatic herpes zoster herpes simplex infection within 90 day prior first dose
